The campus has a text alert to the students and facility to notify if anything unusual occurs.
Like I said joining a club or a frat would be an awesome idea to help those around you.
Join a frat or a club! Great way to interact with people your age.
Great food and it is amazing fast to just pick up if your on the go.
I have not stayed in the dorm rooms.
Just pay attention and study! I guarantee it will pay off in the long run.
I love this university and the teachers. Great environment to be around, even though it takes forever to find parking.. Overall it is an awesome place to earn your degree.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {549705=It is very inexpensive with lots of opportunity available for students looking for a great start. It serves the local community very well, sponsoring events, etc. I have enjoyed my time here quite a lot and is recommended especially if you can tolerate the area's 9 month long summer (March - October)., 207466=1-suicide 2012 2-robbies and attackes in the parking lot but thats about it, 289596=UTPA is a great college. The campus is expanding in many ways including its parking. Having attended Texas State University in 2002 I can say for a college it offers everything along with many opportunities to network and get the full college experience., 626930=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 266574=The University of Texas-Pan American is a campus that I've been attending since 2005 and now going for my masters. The faculty are very helpful and do their best to help make my time here effortless. However, the paperwork to apply for admission has been total confusion from the start and I felt that I was getting nowhere for quite some time.}
